Room.Name: Emergency Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the emergency room of a huge medical facility.
Room.LongDescription: The hospital is actually run by an order of paladins, the Order of the White Rose. In the Land of Mordor there is an everlasting cycle of life and death, one followed by the other in an eternal search for adventure and treasure. The paladins would like to learn the meaning of it all.
